page.title: 05GOODYEAR TYRE COMPANY
page.content: The Goodyear Tyre & Rubber Company is American owned. It employs over 150,000 people throughout the world. This factory in Bushbury stretches over 100 acres of land surrounded by Stafford Road, the railway line & Bushbury Lane. Over 3,500 people work here and it is one of main employers in Wolverhampton. Goodyears make tyres, pliofilm (for packaging) and many other items which benefit millions of consumers. They can make a tyre for any kind of vehicle. Tyres are exported worldwide, some being made especially for racing cars. To help promote the company Goodyears have an airship that travels all over the world advertising the "Goodyear" name. The company flag is blue and yellow bearing a winged foot emblem.
